TopicTitle: "The Few, The Proud, The Green" - my (original) attempt at a KSP theme song

Articles.Content:
Hey gang,

So I know I\'m super new here, but KSP has fast become one of my favorite pastimes, and I was immediately inspired to write some music for it because it has none. I came up with something I enjoy listening to while playing so much, I couldn\'t help but share it with you all. So load up itunes or whatever you like, put this on, and launch some rockets.

I tried to capture the majesty and quirky humor of the game at once and I don\'t think I did too bad a job.

Without further ado, I give you 'The Few, The Proud, The Green'.

Feedback appreciated!
Hey, that\'s pretty good! We have some graphic artists in the KSP community, but I think yours is the first musical contribution.

Thank you! I currently have it on loop; it makes the whole experience going to the Mun that much more epic...although it was inadvertently hilarious to have this music on while I was bouncing all over the place trying to land..!
Very nice, I like it. I think there was a thread containing a bunch of compositions suggested for the game.
That is just fantastic! Now I have something to replace my looping Benny Hill music with when I attempt my Mun landings!

Many thanks, Abrexus! I\'m not sure you should stop playing Benny Hill, because that pretty much encapsulates every time I try to land, at least...

I\'m presently working on the next track in a series, an entire suite of music intended to capture the entirety of a there-and-back munar excursion:

1. The Few, the Proud, the Green (launch)

2. Moonrise over Kerbin (orbit)

3. Onward and Upward (Trans-munar Injection)

4. The Descent 

5. Surface of Mun

6. The Journey Home/Splashdown

A little ambitious, but what the hey, it\'s summer and I have some spare time.
Holy crap, you rock. Better than the crap I do TBH. So, I don\'t really have any criticism of it. Well done sir!
Captures the mood of the game well, serious with a hint of jauntiness.

Just wanted to say (im not a coder or whatever this is just a suggestion) maybe if you can get one of the plugin makers to code this into the game so it will play like you want it to! that would be an awesome plugin and maybe you can actually submit the entire album you\'re making to the developers and they might add it! anway great job i cant wait for more
great idea...I\'m all thumbs when it comes to coding, but I\'d love to not have to run itunes in the background...
You know what this reminds me of for some reason? Anybody remember Club Penguin from years ago?

I\'ve never heard of this Club Penguin you speak of...but I can confirm that the melody was inspired heavily by The Right Stuff...it\'s been floating around my brain for awhile, and when I played this game and got into it, I was like 'aha!'. Now I sound like a pretentious jerk! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I like it! Looking forward to the other tracks.

I think this music is better for a 'menu music', when the game starts and the menu appear.

For the launch, maybe use a more stressful theme, because in my opinion the launch is always a critical part of the fly, it\'s tense !

Anyway this is a really good music ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)(I\'m secretly hoping your futur soundtracks will be include in-game, it\'s one of the only missing things in KSP)

well that is great probably before you know it harv might ask you to put it in ksp lol ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I just want to throw my support in for the further tracks! I really enjoyed what you have done so far (as I mentioned earlier), and I am mixing that in with the music from 'The Right Stuff' and of course the Benny Hill theme for when things go a bit bonkers!
Can anyone post a YouTube video with the song? My computer\'s downloading is wonked out ATM.
I can put it up on youtube, no problem. What do you guys use to record yourselves playing the game? I\'d like to make a little movie about it...
